text: Bhanidinus ki mero aphno palanakartako tarphabata e'uta pramana cha ra timile tyasala'i asatya bhandachau juna kurako lagi hatara garirakheka chau tyo masita chaina. Adesa dina allahakai adhikarama cha aru kasaiko ho'ina. Usale satyakura bata'idincha ra uhi sababhanda ramro insapha garnevala cha
